document_data.name: Snilloc's Major Missile
document_data.mainbody: '''''Snilloc's major missile''''' was an [[arcane]] [[evocation]] spell that improved upon the ''[[magic missile]]'' spell by increasing the possible damage for high-level casters.
document_data.Effects: This spell produced a single missile and could only be aimed at one target within {{SI|180|ft}}. The possible damage of the missile increased in proportion to the caster's level until a maximum was reached. All spells and effects that negated ''magic missile'' also affected ''Snilloc's major missile''.
document_data.Components: Only [[verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component]]s were required to cast this spell.
document_data.History: The [[Avatar Crisis]] prompted intense research into improving the ''magic missile'' spell, and this spell was the result. and then later published in ''[[Volo's Guide to All Things Magical (in-universe)|Volo's Guide to All Things Magical]]'', where it became generally known to the magical community.
